item.title: Authorization
item.description: The CSM Authorization RPM will be deprecated in a future release. It is highly recommended that you use CSM Authorization Helm deployment or CSM Operator going forward. This section outlines the upgrade steps for Container Storage Modules (CSM) for Authorization. The upgrade of CSM for Authorization RPM is handled in 2 parts: Upgrading the CSM for Authorization proxy server Upgrading the Dell CSI drivers with CSM for Authorization enabled Upgrading CSM for Authorization proxy server Obtain the latest single binary installer RPM by following one of our two options here.
